thread.title: Arya Prakash Raj Gautham Menon Mysskin Pandiraj many others part of visha ani in producers council election - Tamil Movie News
thread.title_full: Arya Prakash Raj Gautham Menon Mysskin Pandiraj many others part of visha ani in producers council election - Tamil Movie News

title: Arya Prakash Raj Gautham Menon Mysskin Pandiraj many others part of visha ani in producers council election - Tamil Movie News

persons.name: arya prakash raj gautham menon mysskin pandiraj

text: Senior actor and former ADMK MLA projects Stalin as next CM Vishal has been successfully maintained the secret about his team of members who will be contesting in the upcoming elections for the Tamil Film Producers Council. Now he has sparked the surprise of the year. Today Vishal and his team filed nomination to contest in the election for Producers Council and his team included a few acclaimed directors, leading actors who are also producers apart from regular producers. . While Vishal has filed his nomination to contest the top post of President, directors Gautham Menon, Mysskin, Pandiraj, actors Arya and Prakash Raj, Producers RK Suresh., K.E.Gnanavel Raja, C.V.Kumar and many others have filed their nominations to contest for various posts of the Producers Council as part of Vishal's team.
